00045 void outliner_operatortypes(void)
00046 {
00047     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_item_activate);
00048     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_select_border);
00049     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_item_openclose);
00050     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_item_rename);
00051     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_operation);
00052     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_object_operation);
00053     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_group_operation);
00054     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_id_operation);
00055     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_data_operation);
00056     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_animdata_operation);
00057     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_action_set);
00058 
00059     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_show_one_level);
00060     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_show_active);
00061     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_show_hierarchy);
00062     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_scroll_page);
00063     
00064     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_selected_toggle);
00065     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_expanded_toggle);
00066     
00067     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_renderability_toggle);
00068     WM_operatortype_append(OUTLINER_OT_selectability_toggle);

00081 void outliner_keymap(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
00082 {
00083     wmKeyMap *keymap = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, "Outliner", SPACE_OUTLINER, 0);
00084     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00085     
00086     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_item_rename", LEFTMOUSE, KM_DBL_CLICK, 0, 0);
00087 
00088     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_item_activate", LEFTMOUSE, KM_CLICK, 0, 0);
00089     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "extend", FALSE);
00090     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_item_activate", LEFTMOUSE, KM_CLICK, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00091     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "extend", TRUE);
00092 
00093     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_select_border", BKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00094     
00095     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_item_openclose", RETKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00096     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "all", FALSE);
00097     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_item_openclose", RETKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00098     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "all", TRUE);
00099     
00100     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_item_rename", LEFTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00101     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_operation", RIGHTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00102 
00103     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_show_hierarchy", HOMEKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00104     
00105     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_show_active", PERIODKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00106     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_show_active", PADPERIOD, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00107     
00108     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_scroll_page", PAGEDOWNKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00109     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_scroll_page", PAGEUPKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00110     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "up", TRUE);
00111     
00112     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_show_one_level", PADPLUSKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0); /* open */
00113     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_show_one_level", PADMINUS, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00114     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "open", FALSE); /* close */
00115     
00116     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_selected_toggle", AKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00117     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_expanded_toggle", AKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00118     
00119     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_renderability_toggle", RKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00120     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_selectability_toggle", SKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00121     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_visibility_toggle", VKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00122     
00123     
00124     /* keying sets - only for databrowse */
00125     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_keyingset_add_selected", KKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00126     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_keyingset_remove_selected", KKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00127     
00128     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "ANIM_OT_keyframe_insert", IKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00129     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "ANIM_OT_keyframe_delete", IKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00130     
00131     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_drivers_add_selected", DKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00132     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "OUTLINER_OT_drivers_delete_selected", DKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00133 }
